entry.title: ES-23 (vana wool slippers)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Shoes
Price: 25.00

All our felted seamless shoes are made using all natural products – wool, water, soap and azo free dyes. They are simply adorable and will make a perfect unique gift all year round. They are very light and comfortable for indoor use. Our 100% wool felt is breathable, and provides natural insulation to keep the feet cool in summer and warm in winter.

  • Leather sole
  • Azo free dyes

composition: 100% Wool / Leather sole
care:̴ Hand wash in tepid water with mild detergents. Lay flat to dry.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
